title: Compliance Matrix
prompt_text: Generate a detailed compliance matrix showing how our capabilities align with each requirement in the tender documents. Include specific evidence from our past work and reference relevant sections of our documentation.

title: Executive Summary
prompt_text: Create a compelling executive summary for this tender response that highlights our key differentiators, value proposition, and why we are the best choice for this project.

title: Methodology & Approach
prompt_text: Develop a detailed methodology and approach section that outlines how we will deliver this project, including key phases, deliverables, and quality assurance processes.

title: Risk Assessment
prompt_text: Identify and analyze potential risks associated with this tender, including technical, commercial, and delivery risks. Provide mitigation strategies for each identified risk.

title: Pricing Benchmarks
prompt_text: Find pricing benchmarks and market rates for similar projects or services mentioned in the tender documents. Compare our proposed pricing with industry standards.

title: Budget Breakdown
prompt_text: Generate a detailed budget breakdown for this project, including labor costs, materials, overhead, and contingencies. Ensure all costs are justified and aligned with the scope of work.

title: Cost Justification
prompt_text: Provide detailed justification for our proposed pricing, demonstrating value for money and return on investment for the client.

title: Team Matching
prompt_text: Identify suitable team members from our organization who match the skills and experience requirements specified in the tender. Provide brief profiles highlighting relevant qualifications.

title: Capability Statement
prompt_text: Generate a comprehensive capability statement that demonstrates our organization's expertise, experience, and track record in delivering similar projects.

title: Resource Allocation
prompt_text: Develop a resource allocation plan showing how we will staff this project, including roles, responsibilities, and time commitments for each team member.

title: Gap Analysis
prompt_text: Perform a gap analysis comparing the tender requirements against our current capabilities and documented experience. Identify any areas where we may need additional support or partnerships.

title: Requirement Extraction
prompt_text: Extract all mandatory and desirable requirements from the tender documents and organize them into a structured list with reference page numbers.

title: Document Summary
prompt_text: Provide a concise summary of the key points, requirements, and deadlines from the tender documents.

title: Win Themes
prompt_text: Analyze the tender requirements and our documentation to identify 3-5 compelling win themes that differentiate our proposal and resonate with the client's objectives.

title: Competitive Analysis
prompt_text: Based on the tender requirements, analyze potential competitors and identify our competitive advantages. Suggest how to position our bid to stand out.

title: Differentiation Points
prompt_text: Identify unique differentiators and innovative approaches we can offer that will make our tender response stand out from competitors.

title: Security Compliance Check
prompt_text: Review the tender documents for security requirements and verify our compliance with each security standard, certification, or protocol mentioned.

title: PSPF Requirements
prompt_text: Identify and address all Protective Security Policy Framework (PSPF) requirements mentioned in the tender documents, demonstrating our understanding and compliance capabilities.

title: Mandatory Requirements List
prompt_text: Extract all mandatory requirements from the tender and create a checklist showing our compliance status for each item.

title: Quality Assurance Plan
prompt_text: Develop a quality assurance plan that outlines how we will ensure deliverables meet or exceed the standards specified in the tender requirements.
